title: Why Does Nintendo Get A Pass On Its Weird Business Decisions? | The Escapist Show
description:
Join our YouTube Membership program for Early Access to videos, badges, emojis, bonus content and more. ►► https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCqg5FCR7NrpvlBWMXdt-5Vg/join

This week on The Escapist Show, Nick, Jack and special guest Marty Sliva discuss Marvel's Avengers and why the industry seems to give a pass to Nintendo on its weird business details. 

Timestamps

0:00 - 4:26 - Tony Hawk Pro Skater
4:27 - 13:54 - Marvel's Avengers
13:55 - 32:15 - Nintendo discussion
